mapper.select: SELECT A.ROLE_ID , A.ROLE_NM , A.ROLE_ENG_NM , A.SYS_TP_CD , B.CD_VAL_NM AS SYS_TP_NM , A.ROLE_DSC , A.ROLE_ENG_DSC , A.REG_DDTM , A.REG_ID , A.LST_ADJ_DDTM , A.LST_ADJPRN_ID , A.USR_TP_CD FROM GPCL_ROLE_DEFIN A INNER JOIN GPCL_CM_CD_VAL B ON A.SYS_TP_CD = B.CD_VAL WHERE A.SYS_TP_CD = #{SYS_TP_CD} AND B.GRP_CD_ID = 'SYS_TP_CD' ORDER BY A.SYS_TP_CD , A.ROLE_ID
